title: BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask– 60 Pcs - Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles Treatments – Look Younger and Reduce Wrinkles and Fine Lines Undereye, Improve and Firm eye Skin - Pure Natural Material Extraction
descriptions:
BREYLEE Aloe Vera Eye Mask — 60 Pairs

Target concerns:
- Puffy eyes
- Dark circles
- Wrinkles and fine lines
- Loss of firmness and dehydration

Key benefits:
- Reduces wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother eye area
- Improves skin firmness and elasticity to help you look younger
- Deeply hydrates and refreshes tired, delicate under-eye skin
- Long-lasting moisturizing effect with a non-slip, time-saving design

Key ingredients:
- Aloe Vera: Soothes, hydrates, and refreshes the under-eye area
- Collagen: Helps strengthen skin, improve elasticity, and enhance moisture retention

Material and quality:
- Pure natural material extraction for a gentle, skin-friendly formula

Special features:
- Easy to use, non-slip hydrogel pads that stay put
- Time-saving 20-minute treatment suitable for daily routines
- Comfortable wear while you relax, read, or work

How to use:
1) Cleanse face and eyes (warm water recommended).  
2) Place pads under the eyes and press gently to secure.  
3) Leave on for 20 minutes.  
4) Remove pads and gently pat remaining essence until absorbed.  
Frequency: Use twice a day or at least once daily for best results.

What to expect:
- A refreshed, hydrated look after each use
- Gradual improvement in firmness and the appearance of fine lines with consistent use

What’s included:
- 60 hydrogel eye masks (30 pairs), individually set for freshness and convenience.

Perfect for:
- Daily de-puffing, pre-makeup prep, post-screen-time refresh, and an easy self-care boost that fits your schedule.
